page.title: 01MAIN FEATURES OF OUR AREA
page.content: Our 3*4Km rectangle consists of a mixture of residential,farming, recreational and commercial areas and a major complex interchange of motorways. { Drumpellier,Swinton,Crosshill {Bargeddie, Easterhouse and Kirkshaws are all residential areas. {Bargeddie,Kirkshaws,Crosshill, {Easterhouse}are all predominantly council houses while{Drumpellier}is mainly private housing and{Swinton}is a mixture of both. There are only four farms in our area.They are{Ellismuir, Drumpellier home farm,{Aitkenhead}and{Drumpark} farm.They are all{dairy farms. In our area we have part of the {Drumpellier Country Park,}a few {football pitches, Drumpellier Golf {Course}and{Cricket Club.
